name: catachresis
text: A comment left by catachresis was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Soilentshuggah, Boyd, TheGreatestCape)

name: catachresis
text: He is playing along!

name: hadakang
text: This is the best Achewood strip.  Unquestionably.  The transition from waterskiing to playing a saxophone with cowboy boots on is almost too much to handle.

name: m3funkyb
text: cowboy boots AND a captains hat

name: straw
text: And that his non-dreaming expressions don't change at all

name: equinn2006
text: Oh Jesus, he is damn prancing with those boots, possibly some kind of jig emitting from his horn.

name: fineoakstructure
text: huh.  I'm pretty sure he's just got his foot up on the railing.  I could be wrong, though.

name: minortough
text: I think you're absolutely right. But i think its funnier to imagine that Ray is playing some classy tune on the sax, to the sea no less, yet still wearing nothing but a captains hat, thong and cowboy boots.

name: smilebuddha
text:
That classy tune is 'Baker Street' by Gerry Rafferty.
... No ? You say No ? Prove me wrong, man, prove me wrong!

name: bazookaradio
text:
Agreed.

It is golden.

name: asherdan
text: A comment left by asherdan was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by fakead, SatelliteTV, nutmeg, SenseiHollywood, dr_sexlove, aperson, Darthemed)

name: badganjil
text: He said something good this time!

name: snowman
text: And still barely broke even on chubbies/lames!

name: gussiejives
text: Waterskiing with fine spirits... that is the life.

name: stuart
text: Her name is Rio and she dances on the sand

name: rachel
text: I would like to both chubby and lame you for this.

name: erinye
text:
Painfully, hysterically true.

Next thing you know, he'll be cold reenacting every Duran Duran video in existence.

All chasing some chick through the jungle in facepaint
All sumo-wrestling with a topless model
All dancing on a gigantic block of ice

name: deusoma
text: I kinda want to do that and I don't even listen to Duran Duran.

name: foetus_punch
text: Two of these three videos involve being violent or frightening a lady. The third on is reminiscent of my jigging freezer sprites. That is all.

name: jesler729
text: Ray is thinking long and hard about this.

name: tomsonlocal
text: A love the perfect contrast between an incredibly serious and deep look on his face when his thoughts are of playing a sax in a captains hat. I think I do a similar thing in most meetings at work.

name: fmercury
text: You can tell that if his captain's hat were removed, his eyebrows would be in the same position as in panels 5 and 6.

name: korukyu
text:
Chubby just for making me imagine that, and the subsequent 3 minutes of laughter that followed for no apparent reason.
I kinda wanna borrow my roommate's cowboy boots and reenact that last panel. But with more clothing.

name: redmad
text: I so wish in my life people had conversations out of a window.

name: rowboat
text: Why this strip has not taken it's place among the highest rated is a sad, sad mystery to me.

name: toiletstore
text: Rated 5 just for the last panel.

name: squid
text: This makes me wish I had cowboy boots and a saxaphone.

name: charchar
text: I have been on a boat approximately once and we ran over a gar (this was on Lake Martin in Alabama), and i swear it flipped us off with it fin.  So what I am saying is I'm glad the prehistoric fucks are endangered and if they're not we should fix that.

name: foetus_punch
text: I was on a motorin' yacht and we hit a seal. I was eight. I screamed, but the real horror was yet to come: the seal caught in the undertow, and it's lil' seal body got all nasty and hacked up from the propeller. Oh, the eight-year old screeches and the red, red seal blood did flow.

name: charchar
text:
dude. That's just awful. fucking awful. i think this chubby is to help you recover and maybe undo the damage.

fucking hell.

name: charchar
text:
When i was about twelve, we were on a road trip, driving through the mountains in North Carolina. It was about 12:30 at night, and my stepbrother and my sister were sleeping. My brother and i were playing our GameBoys. Suddenly we heard this thud and a large white thing dragged across the passenger-side window. My mom pulled to a literal screeching halt and immediately began to hyperventilate. Between gasps we heard her say, "I just hit a person ."

My brother and I began screaming blue murder, thinking it was a skull we'd seen.

It turned out a woman was hitchhiking in a cocktail dress and very visibly drunk, and we'd hit her hand. It cracked off the side mirror.

The fun part was wedging this drunken, injured woman between an eight-year-old on the verge of tears and myself while trying to convince her that yes, she needed to go to he hospital and no, we would not put the radio to classic rock. It was a long drive to Asheville.

name: foetus_punch
text: High five for horror! I think yours might be worse. Actually, in retrospect, that seal thing was just...yeah they were both bad.

name: tekende
text: HOLY SHIT

name: notcool
text: ...I'm pretty sure that was my mom.

name: tipist
text:
When I see "fix up a boat" my brain automatically brings forth memories of the movie Rookie of the Year where some kids have "wood, in the vague shape of a boat" and they fix it up by adding a used motor to the back. They then use their new, fully restored, boat-shaped piece of wood to pick up some middle school girls in one piece bathing suits.

And then the one kid pitches the Cubs into the world series.

name: mattylite
text: I'm totally hearin' Gary Rafferty's Baker Street here.

name: projectyl
text: Yes! Thank you! I know now that I am not alone in this world.

name: sharpdresseddan
text: I originally saw Ray just blissfully stomping around the boat playing free-form jazz. Easily one of my favorite strips.

name: kickstart
text: I bet Ray is playing some Really Smooth music

name: ryanfuss
text: The wide mouthed look of a lazy Ray fishing away the hours. What a sight, great strip.

name: singtralala
text: man i gotta get on a boat with a dude like ray

name: zapatos
text:
Saxophone is on the label for Rad Chilis hot sauce.

It is so tastey and good.

name: aseidel
text: I see the last three panels as part of a cheesey infomercial advertising speedboats.

name: theguitarhero
text: 6 years, Andy Samberg turns Ray's dreams into a reality. Damn a boat indeed.

name: theguitarhero
text: 6 years later I mean.
